# init the corpus
corpus = []
wordnet = WordNetLemmatizer()
for i in range(1,len(df)):
    review = re.sub('[^a-zA-Z]',' ',df['Review'][i])
    review = review.lower()
    review = review.split()
    review = [wordnet.lemmatize(w) for w in review if not w in set(stopwords.words('english'))]
    review = ' '.join(review)
    corpus.append(review)
